features: 3-in-1 Car Phone Mount: Cell phone holder car can be mounted on the windshield, dashboard, or air vent, making it perfect for any car or truck. It's also a great assistant for Uber and Lyft drivers.

Powerful Suction Cup: iPhone holder for car is equipped with super sticky suction and a double lock design for smooth and stable mounting when driving. To restore adhesion, simply rinse the sticky surface with warm water and wipe it dry.

Flexible Telescopic Arm: Cell phone car mount features a rotating 360-degree ball for increased comfort and a safer driving experience. Car phone holder designs an improved telescopic arm that can be adjusted from 3.7 inches to 5.9 inches for various viewing angles.
Full Phone Protection: Cell phone car holder with vacuum silicone rubber and thick panels that provide full protection for your phone from scratches and drops, even at high speeds, bumps, or turns.

Device Compatibility: It is compatible with 4.0-7 inch cellphones including iPhones or Android devices even with thick cases. Phone car holder mount has a one-touch release button, allowing you to release your phone with one hand while driving.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Warm Tips: Not recommended to use the dashboard pad for windshield mounting.
Please install the car phone mount in a suitable place before starting the journey, do not operate and adjust the car mount for iphone while driving.

Do not install the car mount in a position that interferes with the operation of the airbag or hinders driving. Using Steps : Press the release button on the back of the car phone holder, then the clamp arms will open automatically.Adjust the length of the adjustable legs, put the phone into the holder, and press the back edge of the arm tips (not the front edge) to clamp the phone for a secure mount.

360° Free Rotation Switch horizontally or vertically to view as you wish. Easily adjust to the best viewing angle. Reusable and Washable Suction Cup Wash the suction cup surface with warm water and let it dry naturally, then you can reuse the base of this car phone holder. Grip Your Phone Tightly Flexible telescopic Arms to hold your phone firmly and various viewing angles. Keep your phone safe in any road condition, bumpy roads or sharp turns. Adjustable Reserved Charging Feet The adjustable bottom tray can be adjusted at any time. Reserved charging port allows you to charge for free.

Device Compatibility Cell phone automobile cradles with thick hollow silicone rubber on grip arms fit 4.0-7.1 inch phones as iPhone or Android even with thick cases. It is easy to adjust the bottom foot by pulling it out to achieve a single-handed operation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Secure and Versatile Solution!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the BIPOPIBO Car Phone Holder Mount, and it has quickly become an indispensable accessory for my daily commute. This phone holder stands out for several reasons, making it a reliable and user-friendly choice.One of the key features I appreciate is its sturdy build quality. The mount is well-built, and the adjustable arms securely grip my phone, providing a stable hold even on bumpy roads. The material used feels durable, and I have confidence in its ability to withstand regular use.The installation process was a breeze. The suction cup adheres firmly to my car's dashboard or windshield, and the adjustable arm allows me to find the perfect viewing angle. The fact that it's easily adjustable makes it versatile, catering to different phone sizes and allowing both portrait and landscape orientations.The phone holder's compatibility with various phone models is a significant plus. I've used it with both smaller and larger smartphones, and it accommodates them all effortlessly. The quick-release button also makes it easy to insert and remove the phone with just one hand, ensuring convenience without sacrificing security.What sets the BIPOPIBO Car Phone Holder apart is its stability during use. The adjustable arm and ball joint mechanism provide a solid connection, and I haven't experienced any wobbling or shaking while driving. This is crucial for maintaining focus on the road and ensuring the safety of both the driver and the phone.Furthermore, the design is sleek and unobtrusive. It doesn't obstruct my view while driving, and the minimalist aesthetic blends well with the interior of my car. The ability to rotate the holder allows for optimal positioning without causing any distractions.In conclusion, the BIPOPIBO Car Phone Holder Mount delivers on its promise of a secure, versatile, and user-friendly experience. If you're in need of a reliable phone mount for your car that combines stability with ease of use, I highly recommend giving this product a try. It has certainly exceeded my expectations and made my daily drives much more convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product to keep your hands on the wheel!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a car phone holder, and I must say it has been a game-changer for my driving experience. This product offers both convenience and safety on the road.The design is simple yet effective. It securely holds my phone in place with adjustable grips that accommodate various phone sizes. The 360-degree rotation feature allows me to easily switch between portrait and landscape modes for navigation or calls.What I appreciate most is the strong suction cup that attaches firmly to my car's windshield or dashboard. It hasn't fallen off once, even on bumpy roads. Plus, the adjustable arm lets me position my phone at the perfect angle for optimal visibility without obstructing my view.One of the standout features is the easy one-handed operation. I can effortlessly place or remove my phone with just one hand, which is crucial for safety while driving. The phone holder also has a quick-release button for added convenience.Overall, this car phone holder has exceeded my expectations. It enhances safety by keeping my phone within easy reach while driving, and it's compatible with a wide range of phone sizes. If you're in the market for a reliable and user-friendly car phone holder, I highly recommend giving this one a try. It's a worthwhile investment for any driver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must-Have Accessory for Every Car - Outstanding Car Phone Mount!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this Car Phone Mount, and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations in every way possible! This incredible device has made my daily commute so much easier and safer. Here's why I believe this car phone mount deserves a perfect five-star rating:Excellent Stability: The mount is incredibly sturdy and keeps my phone securely in place even on bumpy roads or during sudden stops. I no longer have to worry about my phone sliding around or falling off while I'm driving.Easy Installation: Setting up the car phone mount was a breeze. It comes with a strong adhesive that attaches firmly to the dashboard or windshield.Universal Compatibility: One of the standout features of this mount is its ability to accommodate various phone sizes and models. Whether I'm using an iPhone or an Android device, the mount holds it securely and fits like a glove.Versatile Design: This car phone mount is ingeniously designed to provide multiple viewing angles. I can easily switch between portrait and landscape modes, making it perfect for using GPS navigation, hands-free calling, or even watching videos during long drives.No Damage to Car Interior: The adhesive used in this mount doesn't leave any residue or damage on my car's dashboard or windshield. I've been using it for months now, and I can confidently say that it has maintained its grip without causing any harm to my car's interior.In conclusion, this Car Phone Mount is an absolute game-changer for anyone who spends considerable time behind the wheel. It offers exceptional stability, easy installation, universal compatibility, and versatile design, This product has made my driving experience safer and more enjoyable. I highly recommend it to all car owners out there!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice for the price
reviews.reviewText: I would have given this 5 stars instead of 4, the good- the item was very easy to set up and it is extremely well constructed and durable, easy to adjust. The bad- adhesive pad doesn't bond at all to the dashboard and is hardly sticky. It was warm when I put it on(not colder from being outside) what I did was bought gorilla glue and affixed the adhesive pad to the dashboard and let it set for 15 minutes, then I assembled the holder and it albeit permanently there, works perfectly and adjustable for your preference so altogether a good product 👍
